name: Party Life
content: 就算你怎样睡也睡不着
Everybody in da whole world knows
每天去上班 都打扮 因为我喜欢
搞不好老板 因为我很帅 不会再那么坏
Let me see u jump around
Wow when life a partay go
Yo up at ca we go
I gets it when i wanna gets it
Sit right quick do ya really nit pick
看看自己 we all shine
Shining like pearls we're so fine
因为上帝每天与我同在
生命就像派对 不管你几岁 有没有喝醉
I got da best party goin on for sure
Let me see u jump around
Yo up at ca we go
放轻松去把all da bad times drift away
Let me see u jump around
Let me see u jump around
Yo up at ca we go
Yo up at ca we go
